mapper.insert: insert into board(subject, content, userid, ip) values(#{subject}, #{content}, #{userid}, #{ip})
mapper.select: select no, subject, userid, hit, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %H:%i') writedate from board order by no desc
select no, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate from board where no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no=#{param1}
update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=${no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=${param1} and userid=#{param2}
